Text:
1. Stop internet connection and be sure that you have admin rights  on your system.
 2. Run application from "VideoStudio Ultimate SETUP" folder and then run the keygen CORE.
 3. First select program name in keygen. "VideoStudio Pro X5 v15.0"    
 4. Enter the serial manually (Don't close keygen and don't change the  serial while installing), Enter Name, select country and select ntsc or pal. 
 5. Open the application and click "Other Activation Options", select  "Phone Corel" option and obtain installation code.
 6. Copy this code in keygen as XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX and generate  your activation code. Copy this code in to related area in Corel.
 7. Install "VSProX5_SP1.exe" from folder "Update 15.1.0.34"
 8. Install Bonus content from folder "VideoStudio Ultimate BONUS"
 9. Use firewall to stop internet connection of application. Uncheck   automatic updates and do not update application.
 10.Some security softwares may give warning for Keygen-CORE, it is   false positive and don't worry about it.

Ching_Liu,

I right-clicked to open files in notepad, went to keygen, but as Rock mentions - there is no Keygen, unless we're missing something here. I opened core folder (notepad) & only found instructions, no serial maker or keygen. 

I'm new to this, so please give explicit instructions as soon as you can.

Thanks
@Mavric41 - Your security software deleted or quarantined the keygen without your knowledge.
